=======
CHANGES
=======

0.5.2 (2012-01-13)
------------------

- Feature: Added an interface for the ``MongoContainer`` class describing the
  additional attributes and methods.

0.5.1 (2011-12-22)
------------------

- Bug: The ``MongoContainer`` class did not implement the ``IContainer``
  interface.

0.5.0 (2011-11-04)
------------------

- Initial Release
